metadata.title: CVE-2016-3758 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple buffer overflows in libdex/OptInvocation.cpp in DexClassLoader inAndroid 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.xbefore 2016-07-01 allow attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication that provides a long filename, aka internal bug 27840771.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
